nodes.bodyText:
Not an error.
Just for my own understanding. Why we need another TrackerPreprocessService when we already have preCreate and preCommit hooks?
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText:
Because we need to run the assign actions after the create bundle but before the validation phase.
And both preCreate and preCommit hooks are run after the validation phase.
We should really have a diagram somewhere to document this whole process, so it would be easier to discuss about it

nodes.bodyText:
Copyright first thing in the file is how our DHISFormatter.xml formats new files and it is also the default for copyright to be on top of the file.
I know that we have the other way in most of our codebase.
Should we continue this way, that is different from the formatter or start to fix it?
Eventually when we are going to automatically format our codebase all the copyrights are going to be on top.

nodes.bodyText: I think let's leave this is as it is. We will have to move over at some point to have license come first.

nodes.bodyText: not sure if this is mentioned somewhere else, but I think it would be good to explain why it is called "old" and "new". Which one should be used, what are the differences?
@luciano-fiandesio "oldRuleEngine" only covers notification rule actions. But "newRuleEngine" covers all types of rule actions.
Do we need to open a TX here?
